Hadith: We talked to Al-Humaidi, Abdullah bin Al-Zubair, who said: Safyan said: Yahia bin Said al-Ansari told us: Mohamed Ibn Ibrahim Al-Tememi told me: He has heard Al-Lathi's Al-Lathi's Flag Bin and Waqas say: I heard Omar Bin Al-Khattab whom God approved of on the platform. He said: I have heard the prophet of God saying:
Al-Harith ibn Hisham (may Allaah be pleased with him) said: The Messenger of Allaah (peace and blessings of Allaah be upon him) said: "O Messenger of Allaah, how can he come to you?"
Ibn Shihab: Abu Salama bin Abdul Rahman told me that Jabir bin Abdullah Al Ansari said, and it happens about the period of revelation, he said in his speech:
5 - Musa bin Ismail told us said: Abu Awana told us said: Musa bin Abi Aisha told us: Said Said bin Jubair, Ibn Abbas, in the verse:
